scripts.build: sh -c 'command -v turbo >/dev/null 2>&1 && turbo run build || npm -ws --if-present run build'
scripts.dev: sh -c 'if command -v turbo >/dev/null 2>&1; then (turbo run dev --parallel --filter=palette --filter=paletteshipperfront & npm --workspace palette_backend run dev & wait); else (npm --workspace Palette run dev & npm --workspace paletteshipper run dev & npm --workspace palette_backend run dev & wait); fi'
scripts.lint: sh -c 'command -v turbo >/dev/null 2>&1 && turbo run lint || npm -ws --if-present run lint'
scripts.test: sh -c 'command -v turbo >/dev/null 2>&1 && turbo run test || npm -ws --if-present run test'
scripts.ci:all: CI=true npm run build && CI=true npm run test
